title: Eliud Kipchoge:Eliud Kipchoge Creates History By Becoming The First Human To Run A Marathon In Less Than Two Hours
text:
Eliud Kipchoge Creates History By Becoming The First Human To Run A Marathon In Less Than Two Hours

Eliud Kipchoge Creates History By Becoming The First Human To Run A Marathon In Less Than Two Hours

Eliud Kipchoge has created history by running the first ever sub-two hour marathon. He achieved the feat in Vienna and clocked 1 hour 59 minutes 40 seconds.

The Kenyan world record holder and Olympic champion completed four laps of a 9.4km circuit around the Prater, a park located at the centre of the city.

Twitter

He was assisted by 7 pacemakers and guided by lasers. Because of these conditions the record shall not be in the official stats. But nonetheless he got there first.

Eliud had attempted the feat in 2017 in Monza but fell short by 26 seconds.

HE. HAS. DONE. IT.@EliudKipchoge is the first human to run a marathon in less than two hours!

His official time of 1:59:40 is now immortal.#INEOS159 #NoHumanIsLimited pic.twitter.com/wD6clIzHM0 — Olympic Channel (@olympicchannel) October 12, 2019

Don't Miss 8 K SHARES 1.2 K SHARES 30.3 K SHARES

It’s phenomenal, it’s fantastic, it’s just incredible to watch him – it looks like he’s not even breathing. He’s just gliding over the road. It’s fantastic to be here, and be part of this atmosphere,” he said as per a report in The Guardian.

To have someone doing something as monumental as this, it’s such a boost for all the athletes over there in Kenya. It’s showing that the impossible is do-able,” he added.
